entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublishReadyToRunComposite=true causes runtime stack overflow when measuring performance with perfcollect #19931
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Run "dotnet --info" on Win11,the RID shown "win10-x64" #19926
    untriaged
  • MSBuild Reference tag to pull over the ijwhost.dll if it can detect the assembly is a C++/CLI assembly #19919
    Area-External, Backlog

Closed

  • Compilation Errors with WPF XAML and NuGet `contentFiles` having `buildAction="Compile"` #16149
  • Unexpected pickup of old runtime version for tool package #16148
    untriaged
  • Feature Request: support for nuget package consumption in framework-less projects #16244
    untriaged
  • dotnet pack version suffix is not respected #19713
    Area-NetSDK, Discussion
  • Switch CLI language with a dotnet option #19246
    Discussion
  • .Net SDK 5.0.301 :: Package is not compatible with netcoreapp3.0. Package supports: netcoreapp3.1 #19923
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • referenced package in .NET is not copied if the OutputType is not “Exe” #19698
    Area-External
  • With .NET 6.0 installed, publish .NET Framework 2.1 fails to error "HTTP Error 502.5 - Process Failure". #18642
  • .NET SDK 6 Preview 7 generated file `ImplicitNamespaceImports.cs` contains error CS8773 #19702
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [StaticWebAssets] Tweak the settings when invoking referenced projects #19704
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Cannot get symbol ucol_setMaxVariable_50 from libicui18n #16009
    untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main sdk, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102567-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #19862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102548-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #19861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #sdk-102550-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #19859
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Self-Contained publish with multiple executables? #18282
    Discussion
  • IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract includes XML and other files into output binary #19322
    Bug, Area-SingleFile, 6.0.1xx
  • native assets in subfolders are not respected #16211
    Backlog
  • dotnet build exit with a success exit code = 0 on build failure #16241
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Structure of CLI commands #16248
    Discussion
  • Running a .NET local tool takes a long time #16449
    Backlog
  • dotnet.exe should support response files like csc.exe, msbuild.exe #8725
    enhancement, Backlog
  • Publishing standalone app (C#) fails with C++/CLI dependency #12345
    6.0.1xx
  • Maui: Workload installation failed: The transaction has aborted #19739
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • `dotnet new android` attempts to restore Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-arm64 #19891
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Resolution of native libraries when using DllImport #19929
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Cannot use an Environment Variables in DockerfileRunArguments for MSBuild #4262
    Discussion
  • Suspicious code found inside the ResolvePackageAssets task #16447
    needs team triage
  • Could add parameters(--local/remote) for workload command? #19755
    Area-Workloads, Discussion
  • Unable to find System.Memory and System.Buffers in dotnet6 NuGet source #18265
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flaky test for workload installer logs (#19941) #19971
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #19970
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19969
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19968
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19967
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19966
    Area-External
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #19964
  • Backport https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/pull/19873 to RC1 #19963
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix flaky test for workload installer logs (#19941) #19960
    Area-Workloads
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19958
  • Avoid assuming RSG in non-C# projects #19951
    Area-External
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19943
    Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #19965
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #19957
    Area-External
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19962
